verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> then אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the men אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim מָֽה־ <WH4100> unto him Why hast thou הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> us thus הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> served לָּ֔נוּ לְבִלְתִּי֙ <WH1115> not קְרֹ֣אות <WH7121> that thou calledst לָ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> when הָלַ֖כְתָּ <WH1980> us not when thou wentest לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> to fight בְּמִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> Midian וַיְרִיב֥וּן <WH7378> adversary אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for בְּחָזְקָֽה׃ <WH2394> with him sharply

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to מֶה־ <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> unto them What have I done עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now כָּכֶ֑ם הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> not ט֛וֹב <WH2896> better עֹלְל֥וֹת <WH5955> now in comparison of you? [Is] not the gleaning אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of the grapes of Ephraim מִבְצִ֥יר <WH1210> than the vintage אֲבִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <WH44> Abiezer

בְּיֶדְכֶם֩ <WH3027> into your hands נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> the princes מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> of Midian אֶת־ <WH853> עֹרֵ֣ב <WH6159> Oreb וְאֶת־ <WH853> זְאֵ֔ב <WH2062> and Zeeb וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what יָּכֹ֖לְתִּי <WH3201> and what was I able עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do כָּכֶ֑ם אָ֗ז <WH227> Then רָפְתָ֤ה <WH7503> was abated רוּחָם֙ <WH7307> in comparison of you? Then their anger מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and בְּדַבְּר֖וֹ <WH1696> that הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> toward him when he had said הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> him

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came גִדְע֖וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon הַיַּרְדֵּ֑נָה <WH3383> to Jordan עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> [and] passed over ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> he and the three מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for עֲיֵפִ֖ים <WH5889> that [were] with him faint וְרֹדְפִֽים׃ <WH7291> yet pursuing

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> unto the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Give נָא֙ <WH4994> Please כִּכְּר֣וֹת <WH3603> I pray you loaves לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> of bread לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּרַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> that follow כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֲיֵפִ֣ים <WH5889> me for they [be] faint הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> and I רֹדֵ֛ף <WH7291> and I am pursuing אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after זֶ֥בַח <WH2078> Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> kings מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And the princes סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth הֲ֠כַף <WH3709> [Are] the hands זֶ֧בַח <WH2078> of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֛ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> already בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> now in thine hand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> should נִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> that we should give לִֽצְבָאֲךָ֖ <WH6635> appointed time לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> right בְּתֵ֧ת <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Therefore when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֥בַח <WH2078> Zebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> צַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> into mine hand וְדַשְׁתִּי֙ <WH1758> then I will tear אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <WH1320> your flesh אֶת־ <WH854> with קוֹצֵ֥י <WH6975> with the thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with הַֽבַּרְקֳנִֽים׃ <WH1303> and with briers

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> And he went up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there פְּנוּאֵ֔ל <WH6439> thence to Penuel וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> unto כָּזֹ֑את <WH2063> unto them likewise וַיַּעֲנ֤וּ <WH6030> answered אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> and the men פְנוּאֵ֔ל <WH6439> of Penuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָנ֖וּ <WH6030> had answered אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> as the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> of Succoth

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> And he spake גַּם־ <WH1571> also לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> to the men פְנוּאֵ֖ל <WH6439> of Penuel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בְּשׁוּבִ֣י <WH7725> When I come again בְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> in peace אֶתֹּ֖ץ <WH5422> I will break down אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּגְדָּ֥ל <WH4026> this tower הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ

וְזֶ֨בַח <WH2078> Now Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֜ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna בַּקַּרְקֹ֗ר <WH7174> [were] in Karkor וּמַחֲנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH4264> and their hosts עִמָּם֙ <WH5973> with כַּחֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <WH2568> fif עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> teen אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> that הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <WH3498> [men] all that were left מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> of all the hosts בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> of the east וְהַנֹּ֣פְלִ֔ים <WH5307> for there fell מֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> sword

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַשְּׁכוּנֵ֣י <WH7931> of them that dwelt בָֽאֳהָלִ֔ים <WH168> in tents מִקֶּ֥דֶם <WH6924> on the east לְנֹ֖בַח <WH5025> of Nobah וְיָגְבֳּהָ֑ה <WH3011> and Jogbehah וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the host וְהַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> for the host הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become בֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> was secure

וַיָּנ֗וּסוּ <WH5127> fled זֶ֚בַח <WH2078> And when Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> he pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after וַיִּלְכֹּ֞ד <WH3920> them and took אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י ׀ <WH8147> the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> of Midian אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2078> Zebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna וְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> all the host הֶחֱרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and discomfited

וַיָּ֛שָׁב <WH7725> returned גִּדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> from battle מִֽלְמַעֲלֵ֖ה <WH4608> before הֶחָֽרֶס׃ <WH2775> the sun

וַיִּלְכָּד־ <WH3920> And caught נַ֛עַר <WH5288> a young man מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> of the men סֻכּ֖וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֑הוּ <WH7592> and enquired וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> of him and he described אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> unto him the princes סֻכּוֹת֙ <WH5523> of Succoth וְאֶת־ <WH853> זְקֵנֶ֔יהָ <WH2205> and the elders שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy-seven וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> seven אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And he came אֶל־ <WH413> to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Behold זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> Behold Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֑ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom חֵרַפְתֶּ֨ם <WH2778> with whom ye did upbraid אוֹתִ֜י <WH853> לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> me saying הֲ֠כַף <WH3709> [Are] the hands זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֤ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> already בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> now in thine hand כִּ֥י <WH3588> should נִתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> that we should give לַאֲנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH376> to your men הַיְּעֵפִ֖ים <WH3286> faint לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> קוֹצֵ֥י <WH6975> and thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽבַּרְקֳנִ֑ים <WH1303> and briers וַיֹּ֣דַע <WH3045> and with them he taught בָּהֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> of Succoth

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> the tower פְּנוּאֵ֖ל <WH6439> of Penuel נָתָ֑ץ <WH5422> And he beat down וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֖ג <WH2026> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֶל־ <WH413> to זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2078> he unto Zebah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna אֵיפֹה֙ <WH375> What הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֲרַגְתֶּ֖ם <WH2026> [were they] whom ye slew בְּתָב֑וֹר <WH8396> destruction וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said כָּמ֣וֹךָ <WH3644> As thou כְמוֹהֶ֔ם <WH3644> were like אֶחָ֕ד <WH259> [art] so [were] they each one כְּתֹ֖אַר <WH8389> resembled בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of a king

וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> And he said אַחַ֥י <WH251> They [were] my brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [even] the sons אִמִּ֖י <WH517> of my mother הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [as] the LORD ל֚וּ <WH3863> if הַחֲיִתֶ֣ם <WH2421> ye had saved them alive אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הָרַ֖גְתִּי <WH2026> I would not slay אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said לְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3500> unto Jether בְּכוֹר֔וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn ק֖וּם <WH6965> Up הֲרֹ֣ג <WH2026> [and] slay אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁלַ֨ף <WH8025> drew הַנַּ֤עַר <WH5288> them But the youth חַרְבּוֹ֙ <WH2719> not his sword כִּ֣י <WH3588> because יָרֵ֔א <WH3372> for he feared כִּ֥י <WH3588> because עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <WH5750> was still נָֽעַר׃ <WH5288> because he [was] yet a youth

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> said זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> Then Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna ק֤וּם <WH6965> Rise אַתָּה֙ <WH859> yourself וּפְגַע־ <WH6293> thou and fall בָּ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> upon us for as the man גְּבוּרָת֑וֹ <WH1369> [is so is] his strength וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon וַֽיַּהֲרֹג֙ <WH2026> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> Zebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> and Zalmunna וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> and took away אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׂ֣הֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH7720> the ornaments אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּצַוְּארֵ֥י <WH6677> necks גְמַלֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH1581> that [were] on their camels'

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> Then the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon מְשָׁל־ <WH4910> Rule בָּ֙נוּ֙ גַּם־ <WH1571> both אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you גַּם־ <WH1571> also בִּנְךָ֖ <WH1121> thou over us both thou and thy son גַּ֣ם <WH1571> both בֶּן־ <WH1121> and thy son's בְּנֶ֑ךָ <WH1121> son כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הוֹשַׁעְתָּ֖נוּ <WH3467> also for thou hast delivered מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> us from the hand מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> But גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֶמְשֹׁ֤ל <WH4910> unto them I will not rule אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בָּכֶ֔ם וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> rule בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> over you neither shall my son בָּכֶ֑ם יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> over you the LORD יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> shall rule בָּכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> about גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon אֶשְׁאֲלָ֤ה <WH7592> unto them I would desire מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> at שְׁאֵלָ֔ה <WH7596> a request וּתְנוּ־ <WH5414> of you that ye would give לִ֕י אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> me every man נֶ֣זֶם <WH5141> the earrings שְׁלָל֑וֹ <WH7998> of his prey כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִזְמֵ֤י <WH5141> earrings זָהָב֙ <WH2091> (For they had golden לָהֶ֔ם כִּ֥י <WH3588> because יִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֖ים <WH3459> Ishmaelite הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> They

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> And they answered נָת֣וֹן <WH5414> We will willingly נִתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> give וַֽיִּפְרְשׂוּ֙ <WH6566> [them] And they spread אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <WH8071> a garment וַיַּשְׁלִ֣יכוּ <WH7993> and did cast שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> therein every man נֶ֥זֶם <WH5141> the earrings שְׁלָלֽוֹ׃ <WH7998> of his prey

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become מִשְׁקַ֞ל <WH4948> And the weight נִזְמֵ֤י <WH5141> earrings הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> of the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he שָׁאָ֔ל <WH7592> that he requested אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> was a thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <WH7651> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> [shekels] of gold לְ֠בַד <WH905> alone מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשַּׂהֲרֹנִ֨ים <WH7720> beside ornaments וְהַנְּטִפ֜וֹת <WH5188> and collars וּבִגְדֵ֣י <WH899> raiment הָאַרְגָּמָ֗ן <WH713> and purple שֶׁעַל֙ <WH5921> on מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> that [was] on the kings מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> of Midian וּלְבַד֙ <WH905> alone מִן־ <WH4480> at הָ֣עֲנָק֔וֹת <WH6060> and beside the chains אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after בְּצַוְּארֵ֥י <WH6677> necks גְמַלֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH1581> that [were] about their camels'

וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <WH6213> made אוֹת֨וֹ <WH853> גִדְע֜וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon לְאֵפ֗וֹד <WH646> an ephod וַיַּצֵּ֨ג <WH3322> thereof and put אוֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בְעִירוֹ֙ <WH5892> it in his city בְּעָפְרָ֔ה <WH6084> [even] in Ophrah וַיִּזְנ֧וּ <WH2181> went thither a whoring כָֽל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> and all Israel אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> after שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> became לְגִדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon וּלְבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> and to his house לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> it which thing became a snare

וַיִּכָּנַ֣ע <WH3665> subdued מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> Thus was Midian לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָסְפ֖וּ <WH3254> no more לָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> so that they lifted up רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> their heads וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <WH8252> was in quietness הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> And the country אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> in the days גִדְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1439> of Gideon פ
וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <WH1980> went יְרֻבַּ֥עַל <WH3378> And Jerubbaal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> in his own house

וּלְגִדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> had שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> had threescore and ten בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> sons יֹצְאֵ֖י <WH3318> begotten יְרֵכ֑וֹ <WH3409> of his body כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָשִׁ֥ים <WH802> wives רַבּ֖וֹת <WH7227> for he had many הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> had לֽוֹ׃

וּפִֽילַגְשׁוֹ֙ <WH6370> And his concubine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> that [was] in Shechem יָֽלְדָה־ <WH3205> she also bare לּ֥וֹ גַם־ <WH1571> also הִ֖יא <WH1931> him בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> him a son וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> whose name אֲבִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH40> Abimelech

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> died גִּדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> And Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash בְּשֵׂיבָ֣ה <WH7872> old age טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> in a good וַיִּקָּבֵ֗ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּקֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH6913> in the sepulchre יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> of Joash אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father בְּעָפְרָ֖ה <WH6084> in Ophrah אֲבִ֥י הָֽעֶזְרִֽי׃ <WH33> of the Abiezrites פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> And it came to pass as soon as Gideon וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <WH7725> turned again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּזְנ֖וּ <WH2181> and went a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַבְּעָלִ֑ים <WH1168> Baalim וַיָּשִׂ֧ימוּ <WH7760> and made לָהֶ֛ם בַּ֥עַל בְּרִ֖ית <WH1170> Baalberith לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> their god

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not זָֽכְרוּ֙ <WH2142> remembered בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God הַמַּצִּ֥יל <WH5337> who had delivered אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> them out of the hands כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> of all their enemies מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> on every side

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> Neither shewed חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> they kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יְרֻבַּ֖עַל <WH3378> of Jerubbaal גִּדְע֑וֹן <WH1439> [namely] Gideon כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> according to all the goodness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> which he had shewed עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> unto Israel פ
